heading: # Footers
headingText: The `v-footer` component is used for displaying general information that a user might want to access from any page within your site.

usage.desc: The `v-footer` component in its simplest form is a container.

absolute.heading: ### Absolute Footer
absolute.desc: The `absolute` prop positions footers absolutely at the bottom of their parent container.

padless.heading: ### Padless Footer
padless.desc: The `padless` prop removes all default padding from the footer component.

company-footer.heading: ### Company Footer
company-footer.desc: The footer component as a basic company footer with links.

indigo-footer.heading: ### Indigo Footer
indigo-footer.desc: The footer component with Indigo background color and social media icons and button.

teal-footer.heading: ### Teal Footer
teal-footer.desc: The footer component with a Teal color header and columns and rows of links.

props.inset: Positions the toolbar offset from an application `v-navigation-drawer`
props.padless: Remove all padding from the footer
